speaker: President.
english: President. – It is very significant that the debate on this issue should have aroused so much interest, but unfortunately only five minutes were scheduled, and they have already passed.
original: President. – It is very significant that the debate on this issue should have aroused so much interest, but unfortunately only five minutes were scheduled, and they have already passed.
agenda_item: Croatia: 2007 progress report - Progress Report on the Former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia (debate)
